Walther PPK (Polizeipistole Kurz) is a semi-automatic pistol developed by the German arms manufacturer, Carl Walther GmbH Sportwaffen. It is considered to be a classic pistol from the West, used extensively worldwide. It iss no surprise it got to The Zone by either enthusiasts, the Black Market or even ex-policemen. Very popular among rookies. Of important note, it has been modified to shoot 9x18 Makarov instead of the default and rare .32 ACP.
